author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The Retroid Pocket G2 is essentially just a "Pro" version of last year's remarkable Retroid Pocket 5, with the same design and about double the performance power for a similar price.  It's easily the most powerful and high-quality handheld you can find for around $200...at least until the Retroid Pocket 6 releases in two months.

Retroid website: https://tinyurl.com/Retroid-RGC
Giveaway: https://gleam.io/IjGjn/rgc-retroid-pocket-g2-giveaway
Android handheld starter guide: https://youtu.be/I4mqgcDYZFo

Retroid dual screen: https://tinyurl.com/RetroidScreen
Short cable (2x 7cm) https://amzn.to/4ouvy07
Cable connector: https://amzn.to/4oq3oDg

This was a retail unit that I purchased myself but it was sent to me early by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this video ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitysto
title: Retroid Pocket G2 In-Depth Review
